titleStmt.title: The proceedings of the citizens of Hereford in the delivery up of their chapter and renewing of it vindicated from the scurrilous imputations of Richard Janeway / by a lover of the king, the government, and the city, in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Lover of the king, the government, and the city.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
